so she really is naked!"},{"lineNumber":88863,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ピグちゃん、服が廊下に落ちてて！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Pig-chan, your clothes are lying in the hallway!\""},{"lineNumber":88864,"originalJapaneseLine":"「おー……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Oh...\""},{"lineNumber":88865,"originalJapaneseLine":"「なるほど、こんな感じか」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I see, it's Seal-san."},{"lineNumber":88868,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ピグさんにはお二人から","translatedEnglishLine":"You two have to properly say this to Pig-san,"},{"lineNumber":88869,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ちゃんと言っておいて頂かないと……」","translatedEnglishLine":"so she understands...\""},{"lineNumber":88870,"originalJapaneseLine":"「今後何かあっても","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Because if something happens from now either...\""},{"lineNumber":88872,"originalJapaneseLine":"「はいっ、はいっ。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Yes, yes."},{"lineNumber":88873,"originalJapaneseLine":"　本当にすみません、すみません……」","translatedEnglishLine":"We're really sorry, sorry...\""},{"lineNumber":88874,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うぅむ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hmm...\""},{"lineNumber":88875,"originalJapaneseLine":"「四者面談中の両親と教師みたいね」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"It's like parents and teachers in a four-way meeting.\""},{"lineNumber":88876,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ぎろっ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Glare\""},{"lineNumber":88877,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ひゃあ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Eek!\""},{"lineNumber":88878,"originalJapaneseLine":"「そもそも、どうして裸になっちゃうの？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"In the first place, why do you end up naked?\""},{"lineNumber":88879,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うーんとねー」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Umm, well...\""},{"lineNumber":88880,"originalJapaneseLine":"「別に裸になろうとしてるわけじゃないよ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I'm not trying to be naked on purpose.\""},{"lineNumber":88881,"originalJapaneseLine":"「気づいたらズリ落ちてるだけだよ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I just realize my clothes have slipped off.\""},{"lineNumber":88882,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ねー、たいへん」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"See, it's a big problem.\""},{"lineNumber":88883,"originalJapaneseLine":"「たいへんだよねー」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"It's really a problem, right?\""},{"lineNumber":88884,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ホイホイと分裂しない！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I won’t just split apart easily!\""},{"lineNumber":88885,"originalJapaneseLine":"「わっ、おこられた」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah, I got scolded.\""},{"lineNumber":88886,"originalJapaneseLine":"「クリームちゃんは神経質だなあ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Cream-chan is so sensitive.\""},{"lineNumber":88887,"originalJapaneseLine":"「普通です！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"That’s normal!\""},{"lineNumber":88888,"originalJapaneseLine":"「怒られたから……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Because I got scolded..."},{"lineNumber":88889,"originalJapaneseLine":"　とーう、がったーい！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Here, fusion!\""},{"lineNumber":88890,"originalJapaneseLine":"「で、えーと、なんだっけ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"So, um, what was it again...?\""},{"lineNumber":88891,"originalJapaneseLine":"「服！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Clothes!\""},{"lineNumber":88892,"originalJapaneseLine":"「はあ、はあ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hah, hah...\""},{"lineNumber":88893,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ふーむ……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hmm... "},{"lineNumber":88894,"originalJapaneseLine":"　だが、確かにピグが城の男共に","translatedEnglishLine":"But certainly, Pig being looked at strangely by the men in the castle"},{"lineNumber":88895,"originalJapaneseLine":"　変な目で見られるのは看過できんな」","translatedEnglishLine":"can't be overlooked.\""},{"lineNumber":88896,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ああ、ランス総統……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah, Supreme Commander Lance...\""},{"lineNumber":88897,"originalJapaneseLine":"「しかし、自由奔放はピグの特技だ。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"However, being carefree is Pig's talent."},{"lineNumber":88898,"originalJapaneseLine":"　着させようとしても難しいだろうし、","translatedEnglishLine":"Trying to make her wear clothes would be difficult,"},{"lineNumber":88899,"originalJapaneseLine":"　気づいたら逐一服を着せるしかない」","translatedEnglishLine":"so we'll have to put clothes on her whenever we notice.\""},{"lineNumber":88900,"originalJapaneseLine":"「というわけで、クリームちゃん……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"So then, Cream-chan...\""},{"lineNumber":88901,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………","translatedEnglishLine":"\"........"},{"lineNumber":88902,"originalJapaneseLine":"え？」","translatedEnglishLine":"Huh?\""},{"lineNumber":88903,"originalJapaneseLine":"…………","translatedEnglishLine":"........"},{"lineNumber":88904,"originalJapaneseLine":"……","translatedEnglishLine":"..."},{"lineNumber":88905,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ピグさん！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Pig-san!\""},{"lineNumber":88906,"originalJapaneseLine":"「はへー？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Huh?\""},{"lineNumber":88907,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あ、クリームだー」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah, it’s Cream!\""},{"lineNumber":88908,"originalJapaneseLine":"「クリーム、どうしたの？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Cream, what’s wrong?\""},{"lineNumber":88909,"originalJapaneseLine":"「どうしたのー？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"What happened?\""},{"lineNumber":88910,"originalJapaneseLine":"「わ、わらわら近づかない！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"D-don’t swarm me!\""}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「というわけで今日はピグさんに、
ランスさんから言って頂きたいと」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I want Lance-san to say something to you."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: きょとんと、ピグが自分の体を確認する。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Surprised, Pig looks down and checks her body.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ピグちゃん、服が廊下に落ちてて！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Pig-chan, your clothes are lying in the hallway!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ピグさんにはお二人から
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You two have to properly say this to Pig-san,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ちゃんと言っておいて頂かないと……」

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Because if something happens from now on,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: こちらも責任取れませんし……」
本当にすみません、すみません……」
「四者面談中の両親と教師みたいね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "It's like parents and teachers in a four-way meeting."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そもそも、どうして裸になっちゃうの？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "In the first place, why do you end up naked?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「別に裸になろうとしてるわけじゃないよ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I'm not trying to be naked on purpose."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「気づいたらズリ落ちてるだけだよ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I just realize my clothes have slipped off."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「クリームちゃんは神経質だなあ」
だが、確かにピグが城の男共に
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But certainly, Pig being looked at strangely by the men in the castle

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 変な目で見られるのは看過できんな」
「しかし、自由奔放はピグの特技だ。
着させようとしても難しいだろうし、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Trying to make her wear clothes would be difficult,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 気づいたら逐一服を着せるしかない」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: so we'll have to put clothes on her whenever we notice."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「というわけで、クリームちゃん……」

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English
